protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: The H2 subclass of histamine receptors mediates gastric acid secretion. Also appears to regulate gastrointestinal motility and intestinal secretion. Possible role in regulating cell growth and differentiation. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate adenylyl cyclase and, through a separate G protein-dependent mechanism, the phosphoinositide/protein kinase (PKC) signaling pathway

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
